0.title: Reducing the consumers sales and service tax on food
0.description: The purpose of this bill is to reduce the Consumers Sales and Service Tax on food and food ingredients to 1.5%, beginning on January 1, 2012.

1.title: Clarifying the requirement for deposit and transfer of proceeds from the sale of real property
1.description: The purpose of this bill is to clarify the authorization of the Higher Education Policy Commission to sell, lease or convey property and to designate where proceeds are to be deposited.
